content.rendered:
Premium Coated Single Vision Lens For Protected Vision

Yash Optics & Lens has always been at the forefront of creating value added innovative offering.To Deliver a top quality premium product to single vision lens customers, it presents seto Lustraa, to provide that exclusive protection your lenses need and the complete eye care you deserve.

Seto Lustraa is a premium single vision lens that comes with protective features to offer ultimate protection.

Features



  • HD Clarity with aspheric and double aspheric design
  • Optimum protection from harmful UV radiation.
  • Anti-reflection properties
  • Scratch resistant
  • Water repellent
  • Anti-static
  • Oil and smudge repellent
  • Enhanced durability
  • Cosmetic appearance



Check our Fogmark on the lenses to authenticate your Product



Ask for Yash O&L Authenticity Card for your lenses
